page.title: 02Westhaven Junior School.
page.content: { Westhaven Junior School}is in {Radipole Lane}about one and a half miles from the Town centre.It is a red brick building,with two floors.It was {built in 1954.}The school has over{400 {pupils and over 20 teachers.}There are {14 classrooms,}not including a Music Room,which contains many instruments. We have a{large Hall for Assemblies. On Fridays we have hymn practice.We have another Hall where we eat our lunch.We also use this{smaller Hall for House/Year Assemblies. There are two{large playgrounds,}one for 1st/2nd years and one for 3rd/4th years.We have{two big playing fields which are marked out for football in Winter and Athletics and Rounders in Summer.The 4th years used to take the 11+ and go to the{Grammer or Westham Schools but now most of them go to {Budmouth.}-Toni Hope,Paula Dennis.
